name: SNEK (JaykoSnako)
description:
Remember snake? Well this retro remaster is a little bit different.

SNEK features multiple new and unique takes on the classic game for countless hours of fun. Created on a budget of $0, this game has it all, from stunning graphics to an undeniably bussin soundtrack. Plus it's completely free.

(Although generous donations are accepted).

Play now and you will receive a brand new favourite game.

(no refunds if customer is not satisfied with said new favourite game. all claims above may be slightly exaggerated and have been addressed for legal reasons)
